transcript.text: Guys, if you are satisfied with mediocre movies,
then this video is not for you at all.
In this video, I have unique concepts that will shock, surprise, and satisfy you.
I have come a bit late,
but I've brought the real stuff of 2025.
On your screen is the last list of our Top 10 Hollywood movies.
You will find the list of all the best movies in our YouTube community post.
Today's review, we are going to do

So guys, if you like movies like Phone Booth or Searching,
which from the start puts you on the edge of your seat
that, what will happen next?
A single mom goes on a date
and gets a message on her phone saying do whatever I say
or else your son will be killed at home.
But the condition is that she will not tell anyone anything.
I have been watching Meghann Fahy from The White Lotus.
She did an outstanding performance.

that changes something a little.
But by presenting such a simple concept in a logical way,
it deserves to be in the top 10.
Available in Hindi on Jio Hotstar.
As soon as the movie number 9 started,

I stayed.

Is this true?
